Description: Fragment of oval handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Production date: 200 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes (2015) 142.)
Curator's comments: Name Klearchos. A new die, with the head exceeding the frame.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (111)
